    • drawVerticalText

      public static final void drawVerticalText​(org.eclipse.draw2d.Graphics graphics, java.lang.String text, int x, int y, boolean upToDown)
      Draw vertical text.
      Parameters:
      graphics - draw2D graphics.
      text - text to be drawn.
      x - the x coordinate of the text, which is the left upper corner.
      y - the y coordinate of the text, which is the left upper corner.

    • drawVerticalText

      Draw vertical text.
      Parameters:
      graphics - draw2D graphics.
      text - text to be drawn.
      location - the left upper corner coordinates of the text.
